MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the KY4 and KY5 postcode areas of Cowdenbeath and Lochgelly. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:29pm. Our control centre has managed to restore power to some customers and our emergency response team has arrived in the local area. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:40pm on Monday, 15 February 2021
